languages.text: {n}Осколок К'тан могуч настолько, что само определение могущества теряет смысл в сравнении с ним. Но у него есть слабина, которую вы смогли увидеть только в контрасте с его противником. Осколок — лишь осколок. Он не един, не целен, не может быть тем, чем был К'тан ранее. Ему противостоит нечто совсем иное — единое, осознавшее себя, знающее свою цель, будто метко выпущенная стрела. И стрелу эту создали и отправили в полет вы.{/n}

{n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Осколок К'тан могуч настолько, что само определение могущества теряет смысл в сравнении с ним. Но у него есть слабина, которую вы смогли увидеть только в контрасте с его противником. Осколок — лишь осколок. Он не един, не целен, не может быть тем, чем был К'тан ранее. Ему противостоит нечто совсем иное — единое, осознавшее себя, знающее свою цель, будто метко выпущенная стрела. И стрелу эту создали и отправили в полет вы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The C'Tan Shard is so powerful that the entire definition of the word loses its meaning in comparison. But it has a weakness, that you could only see contrasted against his rival. The Shard is just that — a shard. It is not complete, it is not whole, it cannot be that which C'Tan has been before. What opposes him is something entirely difficult — a whole, sentient being that has a clear goal like a well-aimed arrow. And the one who created this arrow and sent it flying was you.{/n}

{n}The C'Tan Shard is so powerful that the entire definition of the word loses its meaning in comparison. But it has a weakness, that you could only see contrasted against his rival. The Shard is just that — a shard. It is not complete, it is not whole, it cannot be that which C'Tan has been before. What opposes him is something entirely difficult — a whole, sentient being that has a clear goal like a well-aimed arrow. And the one who created this arrow and sent it flying was you.{/n}

{n}The C'Tan Shard is so powerful, it redefines the very word "power." But it has a weakness that you could only see contrasted against its rival. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is not complete, it is not whole, and it cannot be that which the C'Tan has been before. Opposing it is something entirely difficult: a whole, sentient being with a clear goal in mind, like a well-aimed arrow. And the one who created this arrow and set it airborne was you.{/n}

{n}The C'Tan Shard is so powerful, it redefines the very word "power." But it has a weakness that you could only see contrasted against its rival. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is not complete, it is not whole, and it cannot be that which the C'Tan has been before. Opposing it is something entirely difficult: a whole, sentient being with a clear goal in mind, like a well-aimed arrow. And the one who created this arrow and set it airborne was you.{/n}

{n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

{n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'Écharde C'tan est si puissante qu'elle redéfinit le terme même de puissance. Cependant, elle a un point faible que vous ne pouviez voir qu'en la comparant à son rival. L'Écharde n'est rien de plus qu'une écharde ; elle est incomplète et ne peut pas redevenir ce que le C'tan était autrefois. Son adversaire est radicalement différent : c'est un être intelligent et entier qui a un objectif clair en tête, comme une flèche à la trajectoire parfaite. Et c'est vous qui avez créé et décoché cette flèche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Écharde C'tan est si puissante qu'elle redéfinit le terme même de puissance. Cependant, elle a un point faible que vous ne pouviez voir qu'en la comparant à son rival. L'Écharde n'est rien de plus qu'une écharde ; elle est incomplète et ne peut pas redevenir ce que le C'tan était autrefois. Son adversaire est radicalement différent : c'est un être intelligent et entier qui a un objectif clair en tête, comme une flèche à la trajectoire parfaite. Et c'est vous qui avez créé et décoché cette flèche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El fragmento de C'tan es tan poderoso que da un nuevo significado a la palabra «poder». No obstante, tiene una debilidad que solo puedes ver ahora que se enfrenta a su rival: el fragmento, como su nombre indica, no es más que un fragmento. No está completo; no puede ser lo que el C'tan era antaño. Frente a él se encuentra algo distinto: un ser consciente y completo con un objetivo claro en mente, como una flecha dirigida a su rival. Y has sido tú quien la ha emplumado y la ha disparado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El fragmento de C'Tan es tan poderoso que da un nuevo significado a la palabra «poder». No obstante, tiene una debilidad que solo se hace evidente al contrastarlo con su rival: no es más que un fragmento. No está completo; no puede ser lo que el C'Tan era antaño. Frente a él se encuentra algo distinto: un ser consciente y completo con un objetivo claro en mente, como una flecha dirigida a su rival. Y has sido tú quien la ha creado y la ha disparado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}星神碎片拥有着如此强大的力量，甚至足以重新定义“力量”这个概念，但它依然有弱点。只有面对势均力敌的对手时，它的弱点才暴露无遗。它仅仅是一块碎片，它并不完整，也绝对不是星神原本的样子。至于它的对手，则是截然不同的存在。那是个完整的、怀着明确目标的智能生命体，仿佛搭在弦上的利箭一般。而创造了这支利箭，将它射向星神碎片的人，正是你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}星神的碎片是如此强大，甚至足以重新定义“力量”这个词，但它依然有弱点。只有面对势均力敌的对手时，它的弱点才暴露无遗。它仅仅是一块碎片，它并不完整，也绝对不是星神原本的样子。只有完整的、怀着明确目标的生命体，才能像一支利箭一样，刺入星神的心脏。而创造了这支箭，将它射向星神心脏的人，正是你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kraft des C'tan-Fragments ist so gewaltig, dass sie den Begriff 'Macht' neu definiert. Aber es hat eine Schwäche, die du erst jetzt deutlich erkennst, nun, da sich das Fragment und sein Rivale gegenüberstehen. Das Fragment ist nichts weiter als das, ein Fragment. Es ist unvollständig, nicht ganz und kann nicht sein, was der C'tan einmal war. Der Rivale des Fragments ist etwas gänzlich anderes: ein ungeteiltes Wesen mit einem klaren Ziel vor Augen und einem ausgesprochen treffsicheren Pfeil. Und befiedert und abgeschossen hast diesen Pfeil du.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das C'tan-Fragment ist derart mächtig, dass es das bloße Wort "Macht" völlig neu definiert. Doch es hat eine Schwäche, die man nur im direkten Kontrast mit seinem Rivalen sieht. Das Fragment ist eben nur das. Ein Fragment. Es ist nicht vollständig, es ist nicht ganz, und es kann nicht das sein, was der C'tan zuvor war. Ihm gegenüber steht etwas vollkommen Schwieriges: Ein ganzes, denkendes Wesen mit einem klaren Ziel, wie ein gut gezielter Pfeil. Und erschaffen und abgefeuert wurde dieser Pfeil von dir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ク＝タン・シャードは非常に強力で、まさに「力」という概念を再定義するものだ。だが、シャードがそれと対立するものと対峙しているからこそ、あなたに見える弱点がある。シャードは、ただの破片だ。完成しておらず、完全体でもない。それはク＝タンのかつての姿ではありえないだろう。そして、シャードと対立するものは、全く異なる何かだ。それは分かたれていない、明確な目標を持った、感覚的な存在であり、よく狙いを定めた矢のようなものである。そして、この矢を生み出し、飛翔させたのはあなたなのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ク＝タン・シャードは非常に強力で、まさに「力」という言葉を再定義するものだ。だが、対立するものとの対比でしか見ることのできない弱点もある。シャードは、ただの破片だ。完成しておらず、完全体でもない。それはク＝タンのかつての姿ではありえないだろう。それに対抗するのは、非常に困難だ。明確な目標を持った、完全で覚醒した存在であり、よく狙いを定めた矢のようなものである。そして、この矢を生み出し、飛翔させたのはあなたなのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}C'tan Parçası'nın gücü öyle fazla ki güç kavramını yeniden tanımlıyor. Fakat bir zayıflığı var. Bu zayıflığı Parça ve rakibi yüz yüzeyken yeni fark ediyorsun. Parça, sadece bir parça. Eksik, bütün değil ve C'tan'ın önceki hâlinden farklı. Parça'nın karşısında bambaşka bir şey var. Tıpkı isabetli nişan almış bir ok gibi zihninde net bir amacı olan, bütün ve bilinç sahibi bir varlık. Bu oka tüyünü takıp atışı yapan da sensin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The power of the C'tan Shard is such that it redefines the very notion of power. But it has a weakness, one that you can see only now, with the Shard and its rival standing face to face. The Shard is just that, a shard. It is incomplete, it is not whole, and it cannot be what the C'tan was before. What opposes the Shard is something entirely different: an undivided, sentient being with a clear purpose in mind, akin to a well-aimed arrow. And the one who fletched and loosed this arrow was you.{/n}
